title: Impartial Preacher of Truth, Justice, and Law (The)
original_title: Pregador Imparcial da Verdade, da Justiça e da Lei (O)
body: It was the second newspaper to be published in this city, with the first issue being published on February 17, 1823, and the last, which was issue 61, on July 2, 1824. It was a weekly and had as its editor Father João Crisostomo Espinola de Macedo.
